是否展示左侧栏Ribbon Icon按钮: Show Left Sidebar Ribbon Icon Button
请输入发布脚本的绝对路径或相对vitepress目录的路径: Please enter the absolute path to the publishing script or the path relative to the Vitepress directory
在当前obsidian文档中，选择需要复制到vitepress目录的一级目录或文: Select the top-level directory or file in the current Obsidian document to copy to the Vitepress directory
执行命令时,先清空srcDir目录: Clear srcDir directory before executing the command
vitepress执行预览或者编译时,是否先清空srcDir目录,再执行其他操作:
When Vitepress previews or compiles, whether to clear the srcDir directory first 
and then perform other operations
请填写绝对路径\n如果设置了,执行命令时,此目录的内容将复制到srcDir目录:
Please enter the absolute path
If set, the contents of this directory will be copied to the srcDir directory
when executing the command
过滤文件名满足该正则表达式的文件,如果不填,则不进行过滤:
Filter files that match this regular expression in the file name.
If left blank, no filtering will be performed.
根据当前配置，执行预览或者编译时，将执行如下操作: According to the current configuration, the following operations will be performed when previewing or compiling
将配置的固定文件目录内的文件移动到srcDir目录\n: Move files from the configured fixed directory to the srcDir directory
过滤文件名满足正则表达式的文件: Filter files that match the regular expression ({{regex}}) in the file name
请输入发布脚本的路径,当前路径为插件路径: Please enter the path to the publishing script, the current path is the plugin path
将发布内容移动到srcDir目录: Move the published content to the srcDir directory
是否需要处理dataview代码块(需要已经安装dataview插件): Parsing the `dataview` code blocks (assuming the `dataview` plugin is already installed)
